pageProduct.name: Oral B Gum Care & Enamel Restore Toothpaste 110g
pageProduct.description:
Information

The Oral-B Gum Care range promotes healthy gums by fighting plaque bacteria along the gumline and slowing its re-growth. It uses ActivRepair Technology, which is a gentle antibacterial formula, defending from bacteria and actively revitalising your gums. The Active Repair Technology also has strengthening action on enamel, creating a shield against acid erosion and actively restoring weakened enamel.

General Information

Oral-B Gum Care & Enamel Restore Smooth Mint Toothpaste helps revitalise gums & restores enamel in 2 weeks*. #1 Toothbrush brand used by dentists worldwide.

It promotes healthy gums by fighting plaque bacteria along the gumline and slowing its re-growth. The stannous fluoride re-mineralises enamel where it's weakened to protect and strengthen the teeth.

*in laboratory tests on weakened enamel

Product Claims: revitalises your gums in 2 weeks and helps restore weakened enamel

Size: 110g

Fragrance: Smooth Mint

Scent: Smooth Mint

KEY FEATURES

• Fight cavities
• Fight harmful plaque bacteria along the gumline
• Promote gum health
• Prevent enamel erosion
• Fight tartar
• Whiten teeth by removing surface stains
• Fight bad breath

Warnings

Caution: Do not swallow. Do not use this product in children 12 years of age or less. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

CAUTION

Do not swallow. Do not use this product in children 12 years of age or less. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Tube has been foil sealed for your protection. Do not use if seal on tube is broken or missing.

Ingredients

Glycerin, hydrated silica, sodium hexametaphophate, PEG-6, Propylene Glycol, Water, Zinc Lactate, Flavour, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Saccharin, Carrageenan, Trisodium Phosphate, Stannous Fluoride, Stannous Chloride, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Fluoride, CI 77891

Directions

Apply the product onto a soft bristled toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly at least twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist.

USAGE ADVICE

Apply the product onto a soft bristled toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly at least twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist.
